section: Client agrees that any unsolicited positive feedback Client provides to Company may be used in any Company marketing and/or advertising materials (i.e., customer testimonials).
explanation: This section is ambiguous in text because it doesn't define what constitutes "unsolicited positive feedback." This could lead to disputes over whether certain feedback was truly unsolicited or whether the client had an expectation of privacy.

section: Terms of the project: 12 weeks from February 8, 2018 to May 3, 2018.
explanation: This statement is inconsistent in text. 12 weeks from February 8, 2018 would end on May 3, 2018. However, that time period is not possible. This means there is a contradiction within the agreement regarding the project deadline.

section: Client shall make a prepayment of $1,900 and pay the remaining $3,100 on completion of the Scope of Work.
explanation: This section contains ambiguity in text. The term "completion of the Scope of Work" is not clearly defined. It is unclear if this means when the website is delivered, when all stages in Exhibit A are completed, or some other milestone. This vagueness could lead to disputes about when the final payment is due.
